rubric: RUBRIC: Total possible points: 6 Each question is 1 point NO PARTIAL CREDIT: 1. Docstrings are used for both classes and functions  2. All variables are descriptive and not too short (like a or b) 3. All functions specifiy the input parameter type and return type 4. At least either the parent or child class has an init method 5. No redundant or duplicated code 6. No immediate syntax errors Rubric_Score: _ / 6 Hundred_Point_Score: Rubric_Score * 100
